titles.title: A bill to exempt woven fiberglass mesh fabric from certain quotas.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/5/2006--Introduced. Exempts woven fiberglass mesh fabric provided for in the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States from a certain quota imposed pursuant to the Committee for the Implementation of Textile Agreements (CITA) with respect to certain textile and apparel articles.
